text: Yak mozhutʹ vony (vymahayutʹ zastavy) koly vony nikoly ne zauvazhyly budʹ-yaki prava sporidnenosti mizh vamy ta yim, ne budʹ-yaka domovlenistʹ, yakshcho vony kolysʹ maly shans perevazhaty. Vony pacified vy z sluzhboyu huby, v toy chas, yak yikhni serdenʹka buly u opozytsiyi, ta bilʹshistʹ yikh ye bezputni
